description: From Middle French lamentable, from Latin lāmentābilis (“full of sorrow, mournful; deplorable”), from lāmentor (“lament”), from lāmenta (“wailing, weeping”).

adjectives.description: lamentable (comparative more lamentable, superlative most lamentable)

entries.meaning: Causing sorrow, distress or regret; deplorable, pitiful or distressing.
